Summary: large pyramid shape bigger than a two story house different color lights around outside white pulsing light across surface
trends: There has been one other sighting in Johnston City

divs: sighting detailsjohnson city il working another person outside yelled look at that have no idea what it was was like nothing i ever saw before 500ft away over head moving northeast was making a static type noise and you could smell ozone like after a lighting strike the object was pyramid shaped around the size of two story house it had green amber red n blue lights flashing faintly lit around the trim of it and a soft white light pulsing across the surface from the center out was flying around 50 mile per hr object stayed in view for about 45 seconds then vanished 6:02pm 12\29\12 slight over cased no moon or stars were visible yet the object went out of sight very quickly
